00024 CCardGameRecv::CCardGameRecv(CCardGameBase& aParent, RSocket& aSocket)
00025         : CActive(EPriorityNormal),
00026           iParent(aParent),
00027           iSocket(aSocket)
00028         {
00029         CActiveScheduler::Add(this);
00030         }
00031 
00035 CCardGameRecv* CCardGameRecv::NewL(CCardGameBase& aParent, RSocket& aSocket)
00036     {
00037     CCardGameRecv* self = new (ELeave) CCardGameRecv(aParent, aSocket);
00038     return self;
00039     }
00040 
00041 
00045 CCardGameRecv::~CCardGameRecv()
00046         {
00047         Cancel();// Cancel Active Object
00048         }
00049 
00053 void CCardGameRecv::RunL()
00054         {
00055         iParent.RecvComplete(iRecvAddr, iStatus.Int());
00056         }
00057 
00061 void CCardGameRecv::RecvFrom(TDes8& aDes)
00062         {
00063         iSocket.RecvFrom(aDes, iRecvAddr, 0, iStatus);
00064         SetActive();
00065         }
00069 void CCardGameRecv::DoCancel()
00070      {
00071      iSocket.CancelRecv();  
00072      }
